macro.name: CALIBRATED
macro.description: 1 to use calibration file, 0 otherwise; defaults to 1

macro.name: CALIB_FILE
macro.description: Name of calibration File; defaults to default_calib.dat

macro.name: CALIB_DIR
macro.description: Calibration directory for magnets; defaults to

macro.name: CALIB_BASE_DIR
macro.description: Common calibrations directory; defaults to C:/Instrument/Settings/config/common

macro.name: SP_AT_STARTUP
macro.description: Apply last setpoints at startup (default NO)
